item.title: Post-Quantum OpenMLS
item.description: OpenMLS now offers security against harvest-now-decrypt-later (HNDL) quantum adversaries. In #1546 we merged support for the X-Wing KEM draft, which is an early draft for securely combining elliptic-curve-based Diffie-Hellman with ML-KEM.

item.title: Post-Quantum Group Messaging
item.description: With multiple post-quantum cryptographic algorithms (ML-KEM, ML-DSA) nearing standardization, enterprises, research groups, and standards bodies have started investigating what post-quantum secure protocols should look like and what properties they should satisfy.
